result.html: Dá bhfanfainn go maidinIf I waited till morning...
result.ponchtml: Dá ḃfanfainn go maidinIf I waited till morning...

result.html: Fan go bhfeice túWait till you see!
result.ponchtml: Fan go ḃfeice túWait till you see!

result.html: Fan go dtí anochtWait till tonight.
result.ponchtml: Fan go dtí anoċtWait till tonight.

result.eng: Wait till you hear the news.
result.ga: Fan go gcloisfidh tú an scéal
result.orig: Fan go gcloisfidh tú an scéal
result.html: Fan go gcloisfidh tú an scéalWait till you hear the news.
result.ponchtml: Fan go gcloisfiḋ tú an scéalWait till you hear the news.

result.html: Fanfaimid go meán laeWe'll wait till midday.
result.ponchtml: Fanfaimid go meán laeWe'll wait till midday.

result.eng: You don't need to wait till the end.
result.ga: Ní gá duit fanacht go dtí an deireadh
result.orig: Ní gá duit fanacht go dtí an deireadh
result.html: Ní gá duit fanacht go dtí an deireadhYou don't need to wait till the end.
result.ponchtml: Ní gá duit fanaċt go dtí an deireaḋYou don't need to wait till the end.

result.eng: I watch TV till late at night.
result.ga: Bím ag amharc ar an teilifís go deireanach san oíche
result.orig: Bím ag amharc ar an teilifís go deireanach san oíche
result.html: Bím ag amharc ar an teilifís go deireanach san oícheI watch TV till late at night.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag aṁarc ar an teilifís go deireanaċ san oíċeI watch TV till late at night.

result.eng: They decided to stay on dry land till morning.
result.ga: Rinne siad amach fanacht ar an talamh tirim go maidin
result.orig: Rinne siad amach fanacht ar an talamh tirim go maidin
result.html: Rinne siad amach fanacht ar an talamh tirim go maidinThey decided to stay on dry land till morning.
result.ponchtml: Rinne siad amaċ fanaċt ar an talaṁ tirim go maidinThey decided to stay on dry land till morning.
